Topic.Title: Why is Apple the largest computer seller in the world?

Message.Msg: How in trenched? You do not see many 1965 Mustangs on the road today. Popularity will yield to better overall usability overtime everytime. Realize that W8 is already on a larger variety of Nokia phones in a very short time than would have been expected a relatively short time ago. With the growing smartphone worldwide usage increasing, a waste of resources is not remotely a legitimate argument. smartphones are here now and not a fad by any measure. from reviews, it appears Nokia W8 is already edging out ios and Android in several applications. Equal merit will not stand up as easily as W8 is incorporated in applications as outstanding in longevity as Nokia.
